page.title: 16Bexhill tourist survey 3
page.content: {Detractions of Bexhill: Lack of amenities (pubs, discos, sport & leisure facilities, entertainments, shops, restaurants) = 35 Age imbalance, not enough for the young, boring = 30 Lack of public facilities (car parks, toilets, lights, roads) = 10 Untidy, Unpainted = 5 Weather (wind) = 2 No sand on beach =7 None = 23 {Leisure Activities: Beach, sunbathe = 64 Indoor activities(read,sew,relax) = 19 Going out (pub, dancing, disco, concert, theatre, restaurant) = 18 Shopping = 8 Sport = 14 Gardening = 6 Sightseeing = 4
